thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1855
thread.title: rachel z

author: rachel z
title: rachel z
text: i found the prices on flight hones and direct . I like that they came up in canadian dollars. I also liked that they didn't use promo codes so I felt like I wasn't missing out on anything and didn't waste precious time looking said codes up. I don' like that I keep getting pop ups with lower prices than I just paid. THAT IS EXTREMELY ANNOYING. Other than this my experience was VERY POSITIVE. THANK YOU
